title: What's New in Epidemiology?
abstract: There have been a number of recent advances in the epidemiological study of male lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS). Here, we have reviewed the most novel and important literature. Studies assessing the risk factors, natural history as well as impact of male LUTS are included, focussing on recent progress in the field.

authors.name: Sachin Malde
affiliations: Department of Urology, Guy's Hospital, London, UK. Electronic address: sachin.malde@gstt.nhs.uk.
